external_games.name: Katekyoo Hitman Reborn! Kizuna no Tag Battle

name: Katekyoo Hitman Reborn! Kizuna no Tag Battle
summary: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Kizuna no Tagbattle is a game of tag between two of the characters of your choice. It is powered by Marvelous Entertainment. It is also graphically constructed by Shade. The player can choose 2 characters that can unleash a special attack after reaching level 5.
